block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Ista Pharmaceuticals Inc., Irvine, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
02Micro International Ltd., George Town, Grand Cayman, an initial public offering of 4 million ordinary shares. Robertson Stephens.
ServiceWare Technologies Inc., Oakmont, Pa., an initial public offering of 4.5 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Signal Technology Corp., Danvers, Mass., 2.2 million shares. Needham & Co.
SkyWest Inc., St. George, Utah, 2.6 million shares. Raymond James & Associates.
